notes: First seen during the [[Test Server]] for the [[Summer_Update_2020]]
name: Community Handler 2.0 CipHard
behaviour:
Announced abilities:
*{{Sound|ACCESSING FEEDBACK!}} - Turns into [[Community Handler 2.0 CipSoft]]
*{{Sound|DEPLOYING BALANCE PATCH!}} - Fear attack
strategy: Don't attack it, it reflects most damages (ice, fire, energy, earth, death at 50%). Wait for it to turn into [[Community Handler 2.0 CipSoft]]. It walks quite slow making it easy to out run.
